channel.title: 4/25 Terms of Service / Privacy Policy Update: Stripe/PayPal
channel.description:
Updated our [Terms](https://www.ThroneOfLies.com/legal/terms.html) and [Privacy Policy](https://www.ThroneOfLies.com/legal/privacy.html).
**TL;DR:**
* When you pay via Stripe and/or PayPal, you agree to our terms - even if you are the purchaser (and not the player). _This means no reselling keys to G2A, etc._
* We use Steam, Stripe and/or PayPal for purchases and winged under their policies.
* When using Stripe or PayPal, a reminder that there are no refunds (you are purchasing through Imperium42, not Steam).
* If you issue a chargeback, bad things happen: 1 - We pass the chargeback fee (usually $25) to _you_! 2 - Your account gets permanently banned from all related services. 3 - Your key gets invalidated. 4 - Unpaid chargeback fees will be passed to debt collection agencies where they'll stalk you until it's paid. [color=red]**TL;DR: Don't chargeback.**[/color]
